dict.acceptation: 代替；归还，，复位；替代者；补充兵员；

sent.orig: There are three kinds of influencing factors determining the replacement procedure and the replacement is periodical.
sent.trans: 有三类影响因素决定B2C对传统模式的替代过程，替代是有阶段性的。

sent.orig: Annex equipment replacement bulbs, to 15-30 minutes in closed until repairs cooling power after conducting replacement.
sent.trans: 更换灯泡等附件设备时，需在关闭电源15-30分钟待灯炮冷却后在进行更换。

sent.orig: Three methods about the pipe replacement and the replacement coefficient are discussed in the paper.
sent.trans: 论述了三种管道置换方法以及置换参数的确定。

sent.orig: The design of replacement underlayer thickness is crucial to the replacement method of ground treatment.
sent.trans: 换土垫层厚度设计是换填法地基处理设计的关键。

sent.orig: RED light indicates lamp replacement required. Ref. O (LAMP REPLACEMENT)
sent.trans: 红灯表示需要更换灯泡，参见O（灯泡更换）
